item.title: 朝鲜声称发射间谍卫星后韩国暂停部分军事协议
item.description:
South Korea moved to suspend on Wednesday part of a military agreement it signed with Pyongyang in 2018 after the isolated North defied warnings from the United States and its allies and launched a spy satellite, calling it a success.翻译:韩国于周三暂停了2018年与平壤签署的部分军事协议，此前朝鲜无视美国及其盟友的警告，发射了一颗间谍卫星，并称其成功。

North Korea said it placed its first spy satellite in orbit on Tuesday and vowed to launch more in the near future. Photographs published by North Korean state media showed what appeared to be leader Kim Jong Un watching the fiery launch of a rocket from a base.翻译:朝鲜表示，它于周二将第一颗间谍卫星送入轨道，并誓言在不久的将来发射更多卫星。朝鲜官方媒体发布的照片​​显示，领导人金正恩似乎正在观看一枚火箭从基地发射。

Officials in South Korea and Japan, which first reported the launch, could not immediately verify whether a satellite was in orbit. Pentagon spokesperson Sabrina Singh said the U.S. military was still assessing whether the launch was a success.翻译:最先报道此次发射的韩国和日本官员无法立即核实卫星是否在轨道上。五角大楼发言人萨布丽娜·辛格表示，美国军方仍在评估此次发射是否成功。

South Korean Prime Minister Han Duck-soo hosted a cabinet meeting on Wednesday and said in televised remarks the government was moving ahead to suspend part of the inter-Korean pact.翻译:韩国总理韩德洙周三主持了一次内阁会议，并在电视讲话中表示，政府将暂停部分朝韩协议。

President Yoon Suk Yeol is in Britain for a state visit and earlier led a meeting of the National Security Council with some ministers and the national intelligence chief by video link.翻译:韩国总统尹锡烈正在英国进行国事访问，并早些时候通过视频连线主持了国家安全委员会与部分部长和国家情报局长的会议。

The pact, known as the Comprehensive Military Agreement and aimed at de-escalating tensions in the Korean peninsula, was signed at a 2018 summit between former South Korean President Moon Jae-in and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un.翻译:该协议被称为《全面军事协议》，旨在缓解朝鲜半岛的紧张局势，是在韩国前总统文在寅和朝鲜领导人金正恩 2018 年峰会上签署的。

The two sides agreed to impose buffer zones where live-fire drills will be suspended, as well as no-fly zones, remove some guard posts from the Demilitarized Zone separating the countries, and maintain hotlines, among other measures.翻译:双方同意设立暂停实弹演习的缓冲区和禁飞区，从分隔两国的非军事区撤走一些哨所，并维持热线电话等措施。

But the agreement has come under growing scrutiny and faced calls to be scrapped or suspended as critics say it limits Seoul's ability to monitor North Korea's actions around the border.翻译:但该协议受到越来越多的审查，并面临废除或暂停的呼声，因为批评者称该协议限制了首尔监控朝鲜在边境地区行动的能力。

South Korea's National Security Council said in a statement the move would involve restoring reconnaissance and surveillance operations around the military demarcation line between the countries.翻译:韩国国家安全委员会在一份声明中表示，此举将涉及恢复两国军事分界线周围的侦察和监视行动。

North Korea's KCNA state news agency said the Malligyong-1 satellite was launched on a Chollima-1 rocket from the Sohae satellite launch facility at 10:42 p.m. (1342 GMT) on Tuesday and entered orbit at 10:54 p.m. (1354 GMT). KCNA cited North Korea's National Aerospace Technology Administration.翻译:朝鲜官方通讯社朝中社称，Malligyong-1 卫星于周二晚上 10 点 42 分（格林威治标准时间 1342 点）用千里马 1 号火箭从西海卫星发射设施发射，并于晚上 10 点 54 分（格林威治标准时间 1354 点）进入轨道。朝中社援引朝鲜国家航空航天技术管理局的话说。

North Korea had notified Japan it planned to launch a satellite between Wednesday and Dec. 1, after two failed attempts to launch what it called spy satellites this year.翻译:朝鲜已通知日本，计划在周三至 12 月 1 日期间发射一颗卫星，此前朝鲜今年曾两次尝试发射所谓的间谍卫星，但均以失败告终。

U.S. National Security Council spokesperson Adrienne Watson called the launch "a brazen violation of multiple U.N. Security Council resolutions," and said it "raises tensions, and risks destabilizing the security situation in the region and beyond."翻译:美国国家安全委员会发言人艾德丽安·沃森称此次发射“公然违反了联合国安理会多项决议”，并表示这“加剧了紧张局势，并有可能破坏该地区及其他地区的安全局势稳定”。

Tuesday's launch is the first since North Korean leader Kim Jong Un met Vladimir Putin at Russia's modern space facility in September for a summit at which the Russian president promised to help Pyongyang build satellites.翻译:周二的发射是自朝鲜领导人金正恩九月在俄罗斯现代太空设施会见弗拉基米尔·普京举行峰会以来的首次发射，俄罗斯总统在峰会上承诺帮助平壤建造卫星。

South Korean officials have said the latest launch attempt most likely incorporated technical assistance from Moscow as part of a growing partnership that has seen North Korea send millions of artillery shells to Russia.翻译:韩国官员表示，最新的发射尝试很可能纳入了莫斯科的技术援助，作为日益发展的伙伴关系的一部分，朝鲜向俄罗斯发射了数百万枚炮弹。

Some missile experts, however, said it may be too soon for Russian technical assistance to have been fully incorporated in the satellite or the rocket.翻译:然而，一些导弹专家表示，俄罗斯的技术援助完全纳入卫星或火箭可能还为时过早。

"We have to see how properly this is being operated," said Lee Choon-geun, a rocket expert at South Korea's Science and Technology Policy Institute.翻译:韩国科学技术政策研究所的火箭专家李春根 (Lee Choon-geun) 表示：“我们必须看看它的操作是否正确。”

Russia and North Korea have denied conducting arms deals, but are publicly promising deeper cooperation.翻译:俄罗斯和朝鲜否认进行武器交易，但公开承诺进行更深入的合作。

KCNA said Kim Jong Un personally observed the launch, which came just over a week before South Korea plans to send its first spy satellite into space on a rocket operated by the U.S. company Space X.翻译:朝中社称，金正恩亲自观看了此次发射，就在韩国计划利用美国 Space X 公司运营的火箭将第一颗间谍卫星送入太空的一周多前。

After the May launch attempt, South Korea retrieved the wreckage of the satellite from the sea and said an analysis showed it had limited use as a reconnaissance platform.翻译:在五月份的发射尝试之后，韩国从海上打捞了卫星残骸，并表示分析表明它作为侦察平台的用途有限。

South Korea's military said it believed the latest rocket carried a reconnaissance satellite and was launched toward the south.翻译:韩国军方表示，相信最新的火箭携带一颗侦察卫星并向南方发射。

Over its emergency broadcasting system, the Japanese government told residents in Okinawa to take cover inside buildings or underground. It later said the rocket appeared to have flown over and past Okinawa towards the Pacific Ocean, and it lifted its emergency warning.翻译:日本政府通过紧急广播系统通知冲绳居民躲进建筑物或地下。随后该公司表示，这枚火箭似乎飞越了冲绳，飞向太平洋，并解除了紧急警告。

Reporting by Hyunsu Yim, Soo-hyang Choi, Josh Smith, Ju-min Park. Writing by Ed Davies. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:由 Hyunsu Yim、Soo-hyang Choi、Josh Smith、Ju-min Park 报道。艾德·戴维斯撰写。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 英伟达前景好于预期，但对中国的担忧挥之不去
item.description:
Chip designer Nvidia (NVDA.O) said on Tuesday it expects a steep drop in fourth-quarter sales in China - a key revenue generator - in the wake of new U.S. rules, but forecast overall revenue above Wall Street targets as supply-chain issues ease.翻译:芯片设计商英伟达(NVDA.O)周二表示，预计在美国新规定出台后，其在中国这一主要收入来源的第四季度销售额将大幅下降，但由于供应链问题，预计整体收入将高于华尔街目标舒适。

Nvidia, whose graphics processing units (GPUs) dominate the market for AI, is set to take a hit from the vastly expanded U.S. export controls on what the company can sell to China. Sales of the affected chips made up nearly a quarter of Nvidia's datacenter sales in the past few quarters.翻译:英伟达的图形处理单元（GPU）在人工智能市场占据主导地位，该公司将因美国对其向中国销售的产品大幅扩大出口管制而受到打击。过去几个季度，受影响芯片的销售额占英伟达数据中心销售额的近四分之一。

"Export controls will have a negative effect on our China business, and we do not have good visibility into the magnitude of that impact even over the long term," Chief Financial Officer Colette Kress said during a conference call with analysts.翻译:首席财务官科莱特·克雷斯(Colette Kress)在与分析师的电话会议上表示：“出口管制将对我们的中国业务产生负面影响，即使从长远来看，我们也无法清楚地了解这种影响的严重程度。”

Kress also confirmed reports that the chip giant is developing newly compliant chips for China but those won't materially contribute to fourth- quarter revenue.翻译:克雷斯还证实了有关该芯片巨头正在为中国开发新的合规芯片的报道，但这些不会对第四季度的收入做出实质性贡献。

Nvidia stock, which has climbed more than 240% this year, slipped 1.5% in volatile after-hours trading.翻译:英伟达股价今年已上涨超过 240%，但在动荡的盘后交易中下跌了 1.5%。

The company also faces risks in Israel, whose military is embroiled in a conflict in Gaza and where Nvidia's networking business is headquartered. Sales from that unit, whose gear is used in AI supercomputers, rose 155% from a year ago. Kress said the networking business exceeds a $10 billion annualized run rate.翻译:该公司还面临着以色列的风险，以色列军队卷入了加沙地带的冲突，而英伟达网络业务的总部也位于以色列。该部门的设备用于人工智能超级计算机，其销售额比一年前增长了 155%。克雷斯表示，网络业务的年运行率超过了 100 亿美元。

The chipmaker said a significant portion of its employees based in Israel have been called up to active military duty, and if the war continues, their absence could hurt its future operations.翻译:这家芯片制造商表示，其驻以色列的很大一部分员工已被征召入伍，如果战争继续下去，他们的缺席可能会损害其未来的运营。

Nvidia forecast adjusted gross margins of 75.5% for the fourth quarter, above analyst estimates of 72.64%, according to LSEG data. But the company's China troubles could make those margins hard to maintain.翻译:根据 LSEG 的数据，英伟达预计第四季度调整后毛利率为 75.5%，高于分析师预期的 72.64%。但该公司在中国遇到的麻烦可能会使这些利润难以维持。

"The company suggested the hit to sales from restrictions would be offset by other regions; however, there were scant details on this. It also begs the question, with margins so extraordinarily high currently, will these offsetting markets support such high margins?" Capital.com analyst Kyle Rodda said.翻译:“该公司表示，限制措施对销售造成的打击将被其他地区所抵消；然而，这方面的细节很少。这也引出了一个问题，鉴于目前的利润率如此之高，这些抵消市场能否支撑如此高的利润率？” Capital.com 分析师凯尔·罗达 (Kyle Rodda) 表示。

Still, Nvidia said it expects supply for its AI chips to improve as it prepays to make sure it gets factory priority. It outsources manufacturing to contract chipmakers like TSMC (2330.TW).翻译:不过，英伟达表示，由于预付款以确保获得工厂优先权，预计其人工智能芯片的供应将会改善。它将制造外包给台积电（2330.TW）等合约芯片制造商。

Demand for AI servers has grown rapidly. Research firm TrendForce estimates shipments to rise about 40% this year, thanks to their use in powering products like OpenAI's ChatGPT.

BOOMING PROFITS

Nvidia forecast current-quarter revenue of $20 billion, plus or minus 2%. Analysts polled by LSEG expect revenue of $17.86 billion.翻译:Nvidia 预计本季度营收为 200 亿美元，上下浮动 2%。伦敦证券交易所集团 (LSEG) 调查的分析师预计营收为 178.6 亿美元。

Adjusted third-quarter revenue tripled to $18.12 billion, ahead of an average estimate of $16.18 billion. Data center revenue jumped 41% to $14.51 billion, while gaming revenue rose 15% to $2.86 billion.翻译:调整后第三季度收入增长两倍，达到 181.2 亿美元，高于平均预期的 161.8 亿美元。数据中心收入增长 41%，达到 145.1 亿美元，而游戏收入增长 15%，达到 28.6 亿美元。

Excluding items, the company earned $4.02 per share, beating estimates of $3.37 a share.翻译:不计项目，该公司每股收益 4.02 美元，超出预期的每股 3.37 美元。

In response to the newest round of U.S. export rules, Nvidia has already come up with three new products for the Chinese market.翻译:为了应对美国最新一轮的出口规定，英伟达已经为中国市场推出了三款新产品。

But those China-focused chips could consume vital research resources at Nvidia and could end up banned just like its first round of China market chips, said Jacob Bourne, analyst at Insider Intelligence.翻译:但 Insider Intelligence 分析师雅各布·伯恩 (Jacob Bourne) 表示，这些专注于中国市场的芯片可能会消耗英伟达的重要研究资源，最终可能会像其第一轮中国市场芯片一样被禁止。

"Nvidia's move to develop specialized chips for the Chinese market, while a strategic response to export restrictions, faces challenges," Bourne said.翻译:伯恩表示：“英伟达为中国市场开发专用芯片的举措，虽然是对出口限制的战略回应，但仍面临挑战。”

U.S. officials unveiled a new batch of restrictions in October and said they will continue to update them as needed.翻译:美国官员于 10 月份公布了一批新的限制措施，并表示将根据需要继续更新。

Last week, the company also introduced a new AI chip called the H200, which will offer superior performance to Nvidia's current top H100 processor.翻译:上周，该公司还推出了一款名为 H200 的新型 AI 芯片，该芯片将提供比 Nvidia 当前顶级 H100 处理器更优越的性能。

The H200 includes additional high-bandwidth memory, one of the most expensive parts of the chip, which determines how much data it can crunch quickly.翻译:H200 包括额外的高带宽内存，这是芯片中最昂贵的部件之一，它决定了它可以快速处理多少数据。

Rival Advanced Micro Devices (AMD.O) had earlier touted the quantity of high-bandwidth memory on one of its competing AI chips.翻译:其竞争对手 Advanced Micro Devices (AMD.O)早些时候曾吹捧其一款竞争 AI 芯片上的高带宽内存数量。

Major tech companies including Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google, Amazon.com (AMZN.O) and most recently Microsoft (MSFT.O) have announced AI chips produced by in-house design teams in addition to purchasing Nvidia's hardware for their own data centers.翻译:包括 Alphabet (GOOGL.O)的谷歌、亚马逊(AMZN.O)以及最近的微软(MSFT.O)在内的主要科技公司除了购买 Nvidia 的硬件用于自己的数据外，还宣布推出由内部设计团队生产的人工智能芯片中心。

Building custom chips can cost hundreds of millions of dollars and take years, but gives the major cloud companies the ability to include features tied specifically to their AI needs.翻译:构建定制芯片可能需要数亿美元并需要数年时间，但大型云公司有能力包含专门与其人工智能需求相关的功能。

Microsoft unveiled a duo of custom-designed computing chips earlier this month, one of which can run large language models.翻译:微软本月早些时候推出了两款定制设计的计算芯片，其中一款可以运行大型语言模型。

Chinese tech company Huawei's (HWT.UL) AI chip is also gaining traction from local firms as U.S. pressure makes it hard to access Nvidia chips.翻译:由于美国的压力使其难以获得英伟达的芯片，中国科技公司华为 (HWT.UL) 的人工智能芯片也受到了当地公司的青睐。

Reporting by Chavi Mehta in Bengaluru and Max A. Cherney in San Francisco Additional reporting by Stephen Nellis in San Francisco Editing by Arun Koyyur, Sayantani Ghosh, Matthew Lewis & Shri Navaratnam翻译:Chavi Mehta 在班加罗尔和 Max A. Cherney 在旧金山的报道 Stephen Nellis 在旧金山的补充报道 Arun Koyyur、Sayantani Ghosh、Matthew Lewis 和 Shri Navaratnam 编辑

item.title: 加密之王兼币安首席执行官赵长鹏因在美国犯罪而被驱逐
item.description:
The most powerful man in crypto has lost his crown - and could see his freedom curtailed as well.翻译:加密货币领域最有权势的人失去了王冠，并且他的自由也可能受到限制。

Binance chief Changpeng Zhao on Tuesday stepped down and pleaded guilty to breaking U.S. anti-money laundering laws as part of a $4.3 billion settlement resolving a years-long probe into the world's largest crypto exchange, prosecutors said.翻译:检察官称，币安首席执行官赵长鹏周二辞职，并承认违反美国反洗钱法，这是一项 43 亿美元和解协议的一部分，以解决对全球最大加密货币交易所长达数年的调查。

The deal with the Justice Department, part of a large settlement between Binance and other U.S. agencies, resolves criminal charges for conducting an unlicensed money transmitter business, conspiracy and breaching sanctions regulations.翻译:与司法部达成的协议是币安与其他美国机构之间达成的大型和解协议的一部分， 解决了因开展无牌汇款业务、共谋和违反制裁规定而受到的刑事指控。

It also leaves Zhao's future uncertain.翻译:这也让赵的未来变得不确定。

"Today, I stepped down as CEO of Binance," Zhao tweeted. "Admittedly, it was not easy to let go emotionally. But I know it is the right thing to do. I made mistakes, and I must take responsibility."翻译:“今天，我辞去了币安首席执行官的职务，”赵在推特上写道。 “诚然，在情感上放下并不容易。但我知道这是正确的做法。我犯了错误，我必须承担责任。”

Zhao, known as CZ, will personally pay $50 million and is barred from all involvement with Binance.翻译:赵（CZ）将个人支付 5000 万美元，并被禁止与币安有任何关系。

U.S. sentencing guidelines call for prison time of 10 to 18 months for the charges he faces. Prosecutors are seeking an 18-month prison sentence, the New York Times reported.翻译:美国量刑指南要求对他面临的指控判处 10 至 18 个月的监禁。据《纽约时报》报道，检察官正在寻求 18 个月的监禁。

Zhao and his lawyers did not return calls seeking comment.

LOFTY AMBITIONS

After launching Binance in Shanghai in 2017, Zhao dreamed big. "We want to take over the entire market!" he told staff in a company chat group that year.翻译:2017 年在上海推出币安后，赵立志有了远大的梦想。 “我们要占领整个市场！”那一年，他在公司聊天群中告诉员工。

The 46-year-old CEO did not waver in his belief as he built up his crypto exchange. Even this year, Zhao felt a major goal was within reach.翻译:这位 46 岁的首席执行官在建立自己的加密货币交易所时并没有动摇自己的信念。即使在今年，赵也觉得一个重大目标是可以实现的。

"The idea that a five-year-old start-up could mature and operate at the same level as a financial institution that has been around for 200 years was once impossible to fathom," Zhao wrote in January in a review of the previous year. "But we are nearly there today."翻译:赵一月份在对去年的回顾中写道：“一家成立五年的初创企业能够成熟起来，并与一家已经存在了 200 年的金融机构处于同一水平，这种想法曾经是不可想象的。” 。 “但今天我们就快到了。”

In that review, Binance hailed its progress in complying with regulations across the world. The exchange had strived through the year to strengthen client checks, it said, developing crypto's "best security and compliance team."翻译:在那次审查中，币安赞扬了其在遵守全球法规方面取得的进展。该交易所表示，这一年一直在努力加强客户检查，并培养了加密货币行业的“最佳安全和合规团队”。

Zhao's public aim to be a part of all that has been dashed by Tuesday's guilty plea and settlement.翻译:赵的公开目标是参与这一切，但周二的认罪和和解却破灭了。

"By failing to comply with U.S. law, Binance made it easy for criminals to move their stolen funds and illicit proceeds on its exchanges," U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland said on Tuesday. "Binance also did more than just fail to comply with federal law. It pretended to comply."

'ZHAO ANSWERS TO NO ONE'

Zhao was born in China before moving to Canada in 1989 at age 12, two months after China's Tiananmen Square crackdown on pro-democracy protesters, he wrote in a blog last year.翻译:赵出生于中国，1989 年在中国天安门广场镇压民主抗议者两个月后，12 岁时移居加拿大，他去年在博客中写道。

The tycoon crisscrossed the globe in his quest for success, working in Tokyo and New York before moving to Shanghai, where he embraced crypto and founded Binance.翻译:这位大亨为了寻求成功而走遍全球，在东京和纽约工作，然后搬到上海，在那里他拥抱了加密货币并创立了币安。

Its expansion was dramatic. Binance became the world's biggest crypto exchange within six months.翻译:它的扩张是戏剧性的。币安在六个月内成为全球最大的加密货币交易所。

While its market share has slipped this year, it still accounts for about half of global crypto trading volumes, according to research firm CCData.翻译:研究公司 CCData 的数据显示，尽管今年其市场份额有所下滑，但仍占全球加密货币交易量的一半左右。

From the company's earliest days, Zhao kept a tight grip on Binance, as a powerful leader committed to secrecy and focused on market domination, a Reuters report last year found. As CEO, he remained in control of minute operational detail, at the same time posting social media selfies with world leaders and city mayors.翻译:路透社去年的一份报告发现，从公司成立之初，赵就一直严格控制币安，作为一个致力于保密并专注于市场统治的强大领导者。作为首席执行官，他仍然控制着微小的运营细节，同时在社交媒体上发布与世界领导人和市长的自拍照。

Zhao installed a tight circle of associates, many of whom had worked or studied in China, into top jobs. Co-founder Yi He now runs Binance's venture capital arm, as well as other key departments.翻译:赵安排了一个紧密的同事圈子担任高层职务，其中许多人曾在中国工作或学习过。联合创始人何一现在负责币安的风险投资部门以及其他关键部门。

As Binance hired more widely from traditional financial and regulatory worlds, Zhao's tight control over his company was undiminished. The company, which calls itself an "ecosystem," has set up more than 70 entities, most controlled by Zhao personally.翻译:随着币安从传统金融和监管领域广泛招聘人才，赵对公司的严格控制并未减弱。该公司自称为“生态系统”，已设立 70 多个实体，其中大部分由赵个人控制。

"Zhao answers to no one but himself," the Commodity Futures Trading Commission wrote in March after suing Binance for operating what it called a "sham" compliance program.翻译:商品期货交易委员会在 3 月份起诉币安运营其所谓的“虚假”合规计划后写道：“赵除了他自己之外，不向任何人负责。”

It is unclear whether Zhao will now relinquish control of the firms. In the meantime, one of his appointees will take over running Binance.翻译:目前尚不清楚赵是否会放弃对这些公司的控制权。与此同时，他任命的一名人员将接管币安的运营。

Richard Teng, a senior Binance executive who joined in 2021, is the new CEO, Zhao posted on social media on Tuesday. Teng "will ensure Binance delivers on our next phase of security, transparency, compliance, and growth," he said.翻译:赵周二在社交媒体上发布消息称，2021 年加入币安的高级高管理查德·滕 (Richard Teng) 担任新任首席执行官。他表示：“Teng 将确保币安实现下一阶段的安全性、透明度、合规性和增长。”

Reporting by Tom Wilson in London; Editing by Lisa Shumaker and Bill Berkrot翻译:汤姆·威尔逊 (Tom Wilson) 伦敦报道；丽莎·舒梅克和比尔·伯克罗特编辑

item.title: 加密货币交易所币安面临哪些美国指控？
item.description:
Binance chief Changpeng Zhao stepped down and pleaded guilty to breaking criminal U.S. anti-money laundering laws as part of a $4.3 billion settlement resolving a years-long probe into the world's largest crypto exchange, prosecutors said on Tuesday.翻译:检察官周二表示，币安首席执行官赵长鹏辞职，并承认违反了美国反洗钱刑事法，这是一项 43 亿美元和解协议的一部分，以解决对全球最大加密货币交易所长达数年的调查。

The agreement will resolve criminal charges that Binance conducted an unlicensed money transmitter business, conspiracy and breaching sanctions regulations, the U.S. Department of Justice said.翻译:美国司法部表示，该协议将解决对币安进行无牌汇款业务、共谋和违反制裁规定的刑事指控。

Some of the charges, which are both criminal and civil, relate to practices that Reuters reported first in a series of articles in 2022.翻译:其中一些刑事和民事指控与路透社2022 年在一系列文章中首次报道的做法有关。

Here are the key allegations against Binance, its founder Zhao and other executives.

UNLICENSED MONEY SERVICE BUSINESS

The U.S. said that Binance, Zhao and other executives "knowingly and willfully conspired" to operate as an unlicensed money services business (MSB) from August 2017 until October 2022.翻译:美国表示，币安、赵和其他高管“故意并故意合谋”从 2017 年 8 月到 2022 年 10 月期间以无牌货币服务企业 (MSB) 的身份开展业务。

The exchange failed to register with the U.S. Treasury's Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) as an MSB partly to prevent U.S. regulators discovering it facilitated crypto trades for its clients without proper checks on its users, the U.S. said.翻译:美国表示，该交易所未能在美国财政部金融犯罪执法网络（FinCEN）注册为 MSB，部分原因是为了防止美国监管机构发现该交易所在未对其用户进行适当检查的情况下为客户提供加密货币交易便利。

The move was designed to allow Binance to "gain market share and profit as quickly as possible," the U.S. said, with the exchange attracting a "substantial number of U.S. users" to its main website.翻译:美国表示，此举旨在让币安“尽快获得市场份额和利润”，并吸引“大量美国用户”访问其主要网站。

Binance "chose not to comply" with U.S. rules as it "determined that doing so would limit its ability to attract and maintain U.S. users."

MONEY LAUNDERING CHECKS

The U.S. said that Binance facilitated "billions of dollars" of crypto transactions for its customers, including in the United States, without implementing so-called "know your customer" checks.翻译:美国表示，币安为其客户（包括美国客户）提供了“数十亿美元”的加密货币交易，但没有实施所谓的“了解你的客户”检查。

Binance's compliance personnel, including its compliance officer, recognised that the exchange's anti-money laundering controls "were inadequate and would attract criminals to the platform," the U.S. said.翻译:美国表示，币安的合规人员，包括其合规官员，认识到该交易所的反洗钱控制措施“不足，会吸引犯罪分子来到该平台”。

Binance processed transactions by operators of "illicit mixing services" used to obfuscate the provenance of crypto funds, and "laundered proceeds of darknet market transactions, hacks, ransomware, and scams," the U.S. said.翻译:美国表示，币安处理“非法混合服务”运营商的交易，这些服务用于混淆加密货币资金的来源，并“洗掉暗网市场交易、黑客、勒索软件和诈骗的收益”。

Between August 2017 and April 2022, bitcoin worth $106 million was sent between Binance.com wallets and Hydra, a popular Russian darknet marketplace "frequently utilized by criminals that facilitated the sale of illegal goods and services," the U.S. said.

SANCTIONS VIOLATIONS

The U.S. said that Binance had a "significant customer base" from some sanctioned jurisdictions and was aware that Iran represented "the majority of such customers."翻译:美国表示，币安拥有来自一些受制裁司法管辖区的“重要客户群”，并意识到伊朗代表了“此类客户的大多数”。

Binance knew that it would allow transactions between U.S. users and those subject to U.S. sanctions, "in violation with U.S. law," the U.S. said.翻译:美国表示，币安知道它将允许美国用户与受美国制裁的用户之间进行交易，“这违反了美国法律”。

From around January 2018 to May 2022, Binance processed 1.1 million crypto transactions worth at least $898.6 million between U.S. customers and those who lived in Iran, the U.S. said.翻译:美国表示，从 2018 年 1 月左右到 2022 年 5 月，币安在美国客户和伊朗居民之间处理了 110 万笔加密货币交易，价值至少 8.986 亿美元。

Around 2019, Binance continued to serve "thousands of users" identified as being from sanctioned countries, the U.S. said, including over 12,500 users who provided Iranian phone numbers.

'TERRORIST' FINANCING

Binance failed to report suspicious transactions associated with Palestinian militant group Hamas, the authorities said.翻译:当局表示，币安未能报告与巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯有关的可疑交易。

Crypto wallets at Binance were found to interact with bitcoin wallets associated with groups proscribed as terrorist organisations by the United States and other countries, including Islamic State, the armed wing of Hamas, al Qaeda, and the Palestine Islamic Jihad (PIJ), the U.S. said.翻译:币安的加密钱包被发现与被美国和其他国家列为恐怖组织的组织相关的比特币钱包进行交互，这些组织包括伊斯兰国、哈马斯武装派别、基地组织和巴勒斯坦伊斯兰圣战组织 (PIJ)、美国说。

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着股市上涨暂停，英伟达登上舞台
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Lewis Krauskopf, markets correspondent.翻译:市场通讯员刘易斯·克劳斯科普夫 (Lewis Krauskopf) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

A rally in stocks took a breather ahead of Wednesday's session in Asia as U.S. investors mostly shrugged off minutes from the Federal Reserve's latest meeting.翻译:由于美国投资者大多对美联储最新会议纪要不予理睬，周三亚洲股市的涨势暂停。

With the path of interest rates foremost in investors' minds, the market was keen for any clues into thinking at the U.S. central bank.翻译:由于利率走势是投资者心中最关心的问题，市场热衷于寻找任何线索来了解美联储的想法。

Minutes released on Tuesday showed that Fed officials agreed at their last meeting they could take a cautious approach to raising rates moving forward, and would only need to increase them if incoming information showed insufficient progress in lowering inflation.翻译:周二公布的会议纪要显示，美联储官员在上次会议上同意，他们可以采取谨慎的态度来加息，只有在收到的信息显示在降低通胀方面进展不足的情况下才需要加息。

Still, major U.S. equity indexes ended lower on the day. The S&P 500 ended down 0.2%, while the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite (.IXIC) fell 0.6% as both indexes snapped five-day winning streaks.翻译:尽管如此， 美国主要股指当天仍收低。标准普尔 500 指数收盘下跌 0.2%，而以科技股为主的纳斯达克综合指数(.IXIC)下跌 0.6%，这两个指数都结束了五天的连涨。

Despite the day's declines, stocks have soared in November, with the S&P 500 and MSCI's all country index (.MIWD00000PUS) both up over 8% this month.翻译:尽管当天下跌，但 11 月份股市仍在飙升，标准普尔 500 指数和 MSCI 所有国家指数(.MIWD00000PUS)本月均上涨超过 8%。

The next immediate focus was on Nvidia (NVDA.O). Reaction to the U.S. chip heavyweight's quarterly report, out on Tuesday after the close of U.S. markets, was potentially set to ripple through markets globally, as well as through Asia's semiconductor industry.翻译:下一个直接关注的焦点是英伟达（NVDA.O） 。美国芯片巨头周二在美国市场收盘后发布的季度报告的反应可能会波及全球市场以及亚洲半导体行业。

Nvidia is at the heart of the fervor over artificial intelligence in markets this year. Its shares have been one of the Magnificent Seven megacap stocks whose massive gains have propelled equity indexes higher this year, with Nvidia hitting a record high this week ahead of its results.翻译:英伟达是今年市场人工智能热潮的核心。该公司的股票是七大市值股票之一，今年的大幅上涨推动股指走高，英伟达本周在公布业绩前创下历史新高。

Equities will be looking for direction after a largely tepid session on Tuesday. Japan's Nikkei(.N225) ended marginally lower on Tuesday but was still near three-decade highs.翻译:在周二交易时段基本不温不火之后，股市将寻找方向。 日本日经指数(.N225)周二收盘小幅走低，但仍接近三个十年高点。

In Chinese equities, the blue-chip CSI 300 Index (.CSI300) edged up 0.1%, while the Shanghai Composite Index (.SSEC) was largely flat, trimming early gains.翻译:中国股市方面，蓝筹股沪深300指数(.CSI300)小幅上涨0.1%，而上证综指(.SSEC)基本持平，削减了早盘涨幅。

The yen was last little changed against the dollar at 148.34 per dollar. Earlier in Tuesday's session, the greenback hit its lowest level against the Japanese currency in about two months.翻译:日元兑美元汇率最后几乎没有变化，为 1 美元兑 148.34 日元。周二早些时候，美元兑日元汇率触及约两个月来的最低水平。

In U.S. Treasuries, whose moves have been driving asset prices broadly, the benchmark 10-year Treasury yield edged down to 4.41%, continuing its slide for most of November.翻译:美国国债方面，其走势一直在广泛推动资产价格上涨，基准10年期国债收益率小幅下跌至4.41%，11月大部分时间继续下滑。

Trading volumes were poised to slow over the rest of the week, with the Thanksgiving holiday on Thursday in the U.S.翻译:随着周四美国感恩节假期，本周剩余时间交易量预计将放缓

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Wednesday:翻译:以下是周三可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- Singapore GDP (Q3)翻译:- 新加坡国内生产总值（第三季度）

- Taiwan jobless rate data (Oct)翻译:- 台湾失业率数据（10月）

- US weekly jobless claims翻译:- 美国每周申请失业救济人数

item.title: 金砖国家讨论加沙冲突但未达成联合声明
item.description:
Leaders of the BRICS bloc of developing nations and other countries they have invited to join from next year discussed the Israeli-Palestinian conflict on Tuesday, but failed to agree a joint declaration.翻译:由发展中国家和受邀明年加入的其他国家组成的金砖国家领导人周二讨论了以色列-巴勒斯坦冲突，但未能达成联合声明。

The virtual talks organised by current BRICS chair South Africa were the first between the group's leaders since Israel invaded Gaza in retaliation for a deadly raid by militant group Hamas on Israel on Oct. 7.翻译:由现任金砖国家主席国南非组织的虚拟会谈是自以色列入侵加沙以报复激进组织哈马斯10月7日对以色列发动致命袭击以来金砖国家领导人之间的首次会谈。

BRICS comprises Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa. In August the grouping agreed to admit Saudi Arabia, Iran, Ethiopia, Egypt, Argentina and the United Arab Emirates from January, in a move aimed at accelerating its push to reshuffle a Western-dominated world order it sees as outdated.翻译:金砖国家包括巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国和南非。 8月，该组织同意从1月起接纳沙特阿拉伯、伊朗、埃塞俄比亚、埃及、阿根廷和阿拉伯联合酋长国，此举旨在加速推动其认为已经过时的西方主导的世界秩序的洗牌。

South African President Cyril Ramaphosa told Tuesday's talks that diplomats did not have sufficient time to draft a declaration.翻译:南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨在周二的会谈中表示，外交官没有足够的时间起草声明。

"We've called upon all parties to exercise maximum restraint," Ramaphosa said in his summary of the discussions. "We affirmed ... that a just and lasting solution to the Palestinian-Israeli conflict can be achieved by peaceful means."翻译:拉马福萨在总结讨论时表示：“我们呼吁各方保持最大限度的克制。” “我们申明……可以通过和平手段实现巴以冲突的公正和持久解决。”

Different leaders emphasised different points in their remarks.翻译:不同领导人在讲话中强调了不同的观点。

Argentina's Foreign Minister Santiago Cafiero said his country recognised Israel's right "to legitimate self-defence while strictly respecting humanitarian international law", while China's Xi Jinping appeared to show more sympathy for the Palestinians.翻译:阿根廷外交部长圣地亚哥·卡菲罗表示，阿根廷承认以色列“在严格遵守人道主义国际法的同时进行合法自卫”的权利，而中国国家主席习近平似乎对巴勒斯坦人表现出更多的同情。

"The root cause of the Palestinian-Israeli situation is the fact that the right of the Palestinian people to statehood, their right to existence, and their right of return have long been ignored," Xi said.翻译:习近平指出，巴以局势的根源在于巴勒斯坦人民的建国权、生存权、回归权长期被忽视。

Russian President Vladimir Putin blamed the crisis on the failure of U.S. diplomacy in the Middle East.翻译:俄罗斯总统普京将这场危机归咎于美国在中东外交的失败。

"We call for joint efforts of the international community aimed at de-escalating the situation, a ceasefire and finding a political solution to the Palestinian-Israeli conflict. And the BRICS states... could play a key role in this work," Putin said.翻译:普京表示：“我们呼吁国际社会共同努力，缓和局势、实现停火并找到巴以冲突的政治解决方案。金砖国家……可以在这项工作中发挥关键作用。”说。

Reporting by Carien du Plessis, Bhargav Acharya, Ethan Wang, Krishn Kaushik and Gabriel Araujo Editing by Alexander Winning and Gareth Jones翻译:Carien du Plessis、Bhargav Acharya、Ethan Wang、Krishn Kaushik 和 Gabriel Araujo 报道 Alexander Winning 和 Gareth Jones 编辑

item.title: 缅甸向中国移交数千名电信诈骗嫌疑人
item.description:
Myanmar authorities have handed over 31,000 telecom fraud suspects to China since law enforcement officers from both countries launched a crackdown on online scams in September, Chinese authorities said on Tuesday.翻译:中国当局周二表示，自两国执法人员9月发起打击网络诈骗以来，缅甸当局已将31,000名电信诈骗嫌疑人移交给中国。

The suspects included 63 "financiers" and ring-leaders of crime syndicates that have cheated Chinese citizens of large sums of money, the Ministry of Public Security said in a statement.翻译:公安部在一份声明中称，犯罪嫌疑人包括63名“金融家”和犯罪集团头目，他们诈骗中国公民巨额资金。

"The crackdown has achieved significant battle results," the ministry said.翻译:公安部表示，此次打击行动取得了显著成效。

More than 100,000 people engage in telecom fraud each day in at least 1,000 scam centres in Myanmar, which shares a border with southwest China, Chinese state media has reported.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，与中国西南部接壤的缅甸，每天有超过 10 万人在至少 1,000 个诈骗中心从事电信诈骗。

Chinese police started to crack down on the fraud in September and this month, police launched what they said were "swift attacks" on crime gangs in Myanmar.翻译:中国警方从九月份开始打击诈骗活动，本月警方对缅甸的犯罪团伙发起了所谓的“迅速打击”。

The Myanmar ringleader of a gang committed suicide last week while on the run from Myanmar authorities, Chinese police said. Three members of his gang were later handed over to Chinese police.翻译:中国警方称，一名缅甸团伙头目上周在躲避缅甸当局追捕时自杀身亡。该团伙的三名成员后来被移交给中国警方。

With telecom scams in Myanmar targeting Chinese citizens surging, Assistant Foreign Minister Nong Rong visited Myanmar this month, saying China was ready to work with Myanmar on tackling cross-border crime including online gambling.翻译:随着缅甸针对中国公民的电信诈骗激增，外交部部长助理农融本月访问缅甸，表示中方已准备好与缅方合作打击包括网络赌博在内的跨境犯罪。

Nong also said China supported Myanmar in maintaining stability on their common border as Myanmar's junta battled insurgents in the area.翻译:农还表示，在缅甸军政府与该地区的叛乱分子作战之际，中国支持缅甸维护共同边界的稳定。

Myanmar's ruling military is facing attacks on multiple fronts in its borderlands as an alliance of ethnic minority insurgent groups combines with pro-democracy fighters to challenge the junta's rule.翻译:缅甸执政军队在边境地区面临多条战线的攻击，少数民族叛乱组织联盟与民主派战士联合起来挑战军政府的统治。

China has called for peace.翻译:中国呼吁和平。

"China has been playing a constructive role in its own way to promote peace talks and urge relevant parties to put the interests of the people first, cease fire and end war as soon as possible," a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人周一表示：“中方一直以自己的方式发挥建设性作用，劝和促谈，敦促有关各方以人民利益为重，尽快停火止战。”

Reporting by Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo翻译:Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 报道

item.title: 上海犹太难民历史成为新清唱剧的中心舞台
item.description:
Four years after it was first conceived, the oratorio Emigre made its debut this month in Shanghai, paying tribute to the Chinese financial hub's war-time role in protecting European Jewish refugees who fled to the city in the late 1930s.翻译:清唱剧《流亡者》首次构思四年后，于本月在上海首演，向中国金融中心在战时保护 1930 年代末逃往该市的欧洲犹太难民方面所发挥的作用致敬。

A collaboration between the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra, New York Philharmonic as well as choirs from the U.S. and China, the work premiered on Nov. 17.翻译:该作品由上海交响乐团、纽约爱乐乐团以及中美合唱团合作，于11月17日首演。

Composer Aaron Zigman, known best for his movie scores, said he was approached by Shanghai Symphony Orchestra's maestro Long Yu in 2019 with the idea for a piece telling the story of Shanghai's Jewish refugee history.翻译:以电影配乐而闻名的作曲家亚伦·齐格曼表示，2019 年，上海交响乐团指挥大师余隆找到他，提出创作一部讲述上海犹太难民历史故事的作品的想法。

"This is a story about two German Jewish brothers who had to flee Nazi Germany, and they came to Shanghai, which at that time opened its doors to many Jews," Zigman said.翻译:“这是一个关于两个德国犹太兄弟不得不逃离纳粹德国，来到上海的故事，当时上海向许多犹太人敞开了大门，”齐格曼说。

"It's really a multicultural love story at the end of the day, and then a story of humanity, love, hope and acceptance through the tragedy of loss as well."翻译:“归根结底，这确实是一个多元文化的爱情故事，也是一个在失去亲人的悲剧中讲述人性、爱、希望和接受的故事。”

In the late 1930s, as World War Two was about to break out, Shanghai was one of the few places in the world open to Jewish refugees, as many countries restricted visa access. As an "open port" a visa wasn't required for those arriving in Shanghai, mainly by boat, from Europe.翻译:20世纪30年代末，第二次世界大战即将爆发，上海是世界上少数向犹太难民开放的地方之一，因为许多国家限制签证。作为一个“开放港口”，那些主要从欧洲乘船抵达上海的人不需要签证。

An estimated 20,000 European Jews would escape to Shanghai throughout this period, though their new home was not without strife. China was also at war, with Japan, and Shanghai was occupied by Japanese forces from 1937.翻译:在此期间，估计有 20,000 名欧洲犹太人逃往上海，尽管他们的新家并非没有发生冲突。中国也与日本交战，上海从 1937 年起被日本军队占领。

Mark Campbell, the Pulitzer Prize-winning librettist behind the lyrics for Emigre said he felt the story was "special and important" to tell now, in view of the conflict between Israel and Hamas in Gaza, as well as the war in Ukraine.翻译:普利策奖得主、《移民》歌词作者马克·坎贝尔表示，考虑到以色列和哈马斯在加沙的冲突以及乌克兰的战争，他觉得现在讲述这个故事“特别且重要”。

"I believe that the message of accepting refugees, of accepting people and welcoming them, is resonating even more now," he added.翻译:他补充说：“我相信，接受难民、接受人们并欢迎他们的信息现在更能引起共鸣。”

Chen Jian, curator of the Shanghai Jewish Refugees Museum, was in the audience for Emigre's global premiere at the Jaguar Shanghai Symphony Orchestra Hall in downtown Shanghai.翻译:上海犹太难民博物馆馆长陈健在上海市中心的捷豹上海交响乐团音乐厅观看了《移民》全球首演。

"I think this kind of creation is very meaningful and valuable," he told Reuters before the performance. "In mankind's darkest times, we need kind hearts and good deeds. This story should have an educational effect on how we look at disputes in the world today."翻译:“我认为这种创作非常有意义和有价值，”他在演出前告诉路透社。 “在人类最黑暗的时期，我们需要善良的心和善行。这个故事应该对我们如何看待当今世界的争端产生教育作用。”

The work, sung in English with Chinese supertitles, ran in Shanghai through Nov. 20. It is scheduled to be performed in New York early next year.翻译:这部作品以英文演唱，配有中文字幕，于 11 月 20 日在上海演出。预计明年初在纽约演出。

Reporting by Casey Hall; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:凯西·霍尔报道；索纳利·保罗编辑
item.author: Casey Hall

item.title: 尽管当选总统米莱批评，中国仍准备与阿根廷合作
item.description:
China is ready to work with Argentina to keep relations on a "steady" course, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Tuesday, after the presidential election victory of a right-wing libertarian who said he will not deal with communists.翻译:一位外交部发言人周二表示，在一位表示不会与共产党人打交道的右翼自由主义者赢得总统选举后，中国准备与阿根廷合作，使关系保持在“稳定”的轨道上。

Argentinian president-elect Javier Milei has criticised China and Brazil, which are among his country's most important trading partners. A few months ago, Milei even likened the Chinese government to an "assassin" and said the people of China were "not free".翻译:阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱批评中国和巴西，这两个国家是阿根廷最重要的贸易伙伴。几个月前，米雷甚至将中国政府比作“刺客”，并称中国人民“不自由”。

Milei's tough talk on China stands in sharp contrast with a vow of cooperation by the outgoing president, Alberto Fernandez, who visited Beijing last month and hailed China as a "true friend" of Argentina.翻译:米莱对中国的强硬言论与即将卸任的总统阿尔贝托·费尔南德斯的合作誓言形成鲜明对比。费尔南德斯上个月访问了北京，并称赞中国是阿根廷的“真正的朋友”。

Fernandez also pledged coordination with China under frameworks such as the G20 and BRICS.翻译:费尔南德斯还承诺在二十国集团和金砖国家等框架下与中国进行协调。

"Bilateral relations between China and Argentina have shown sound momentum of growth," said Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁表示，中阿双边关系呈现良好发展势头。

"China stands ready to work with Argentina to keep our relations on a steady course forward," she said.翻译:中方愿与阿方共同努力，推动两国关系稳定向前发展。

But Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the Milei government, was quoted as saying by Russian state-owned news agency RIA Novosti that Argentina would "stop interacting" with the governments of China and Brazil, when asked whether Argentina would encourage exports and imports with those countries.翻译:但俄罗斯国有通讯社俄新社援引即将出任米雷政府外交部长的经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话说，当被问及阿根廷是否会鼓励两国政府“互动”时，阿根廷将“停止与中国和巴西政府互动”。与这些国家的出口和进口。

Mondino has previously told Reuters that Argentina under Milei had no intention of joining the BRICS grouping, which includes China and Russia. Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of BRICS, a bloc whose members also include Brazil, India and South Africa.翻译:蒙迪诺此前曾对路透社表示，米莱领导下的阿根廷无意加入包括中国和俄罗斯在内的金砖国家集团。阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，该集团的成员还包括巴西、印度和南非。

Mao, asked at a regular news conference about the comments attributed to Mondino, said the characterisation of Mondino's comments was different from the interview published by RIA Novosti.翻译:毛泽东在例行新闻发布会上被问及蒙迪诺的言论时表示，蒙迪诺言论的描述与俄新社发表的采访内容不同。

"Mondino said in the interview that some in the world misread President-elect Milei's foreign policy," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“蒙迪诺在采访中说，世界上有些人误读了当选总统米莱的外交政策。”

"No countries could step out of diplomatic relations and still be able to engage in economic trade and cooperation. It would be a huge foreign policy mistake for Argentina to cut ties with major countries like China or Brazil," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“任何国家都不可能在断绝外交关系的情况下仍然能够开展经济贸易与合作。阿根廷与中国或巴西等大国断绝关系将是一个巨大的外交政策错误。”

The Chinese foreign ministry said later on Tuesday that Mao was citing Mondino as saying it would be a mistake to cut ties with China or Brazil.翻译:中国外交部周二晚些时候表示，毛泽东援引蒙迪诺的话说，切断与中国或巴西的关系将是一个错误。

Reuters could not immediately find a version of the interview containing those comments. Mondino did not respond to a Reuters request to clarify her comments to RIA Novosti.翻译:路透社无法立即找到包含这些评论的采访版本。蒙迪诺没有回应路透社要求澄清她向俄新社发表评论的请求。

Earlier this month, Mondino said Argentina had no problem trading with Brazil, and as for China, Milei would seek to end opaque state-to-state deals.翻译:本月早些时候，蒙迪诺表示阿根廷与巴西的贸易没有问题，至于中国，米雷将寻求结束不透明的国与国之间的交易。

"What we are not going to do are secret contracts. Argentina, this government, in the last 20 years, has had multiple secret negotiations," she said. "That is not normal and it is what we have said we are not going to do."翻译:“我们不会做的是秘密合同。阿根廷政府在过去20年里进行了多次秘密谈判，”她说。 “这是不正常的，我们已经说过我们不会这样做。”

Chinese state media has so far played down Milei's comments but said it would be Argentina's loss if it were to shut China out of its market.翻译:中国官方媒体迄今为止淡化了米雷的言论，但表示如果将中国排除在市场之外，那将是阿根廷的损失。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; Editing by Alex Richardson and Grant McCool翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；亚历克斯·理查森和格兰特·麦库尔编辑
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 独家：中国国有银行正在买入人民币，加速人民币升值
item.description:
China's major state-owned banks have been active in the currency market this week, buying the yuan and helping hasten its recovery against a broadly weaker U.S. dollar, two sources told Reuters on Tuesday.翻译:两位消息人士周二告诉路透，中国主要国有银行本周在货币市场上表现活跃，买入人民币，帮助加速人民币兑美元普遍走弱的复苏。

The big banks, which sometimes act on behalf of Chinese monetary authorities, have in the past year often sold dollars to slow the yuan's decline.翻译:有时代表中国货币当局行事的大型银行在过去一年中经常出售美元以减缓人民币贬值。

Their continued yuan-buying activity this week while the currency was already rising was a surprise to the sources, who spoke on condition of anonymity as they are not authorised to speak to media about the matter.翻译:本周，在人民币已经升值的情况下，他们继续进行人民币购买活动，这令消息人士感到意外。消息人士要求匿名，因为他们无权向媒体谈论此事。

The yuan has gained 2% in the past week, to stand at levels of around 7.13 to the dollar - its highest in nearly four months.翻译:人民币兑美元汇率在过去一周上涨了 2%，达到 7.13 左右的水平，创近四个月以来的最高水平。

The sources said the state banks seemed to be following their usual combination of swaps and spot market activity, and were seen exchanging yuan for dollars in the onshore swap market and selling those dollars in the spot currency market.翻译:消息人士称，国有银行似乎遵循了通常的掉期和现货市场活动组合，并在境内掉期市场将人民币兑换成美元，并在即期货币市场出售这些美元。

Their action over the past week came amid broad dollar weakness. The dollar index , which measures the currency's value against major trading partners, has retreated more than 3% in November, as U.S. yields succumb to signs of a peak in Federal Reserve monetary tightening.翻译:他们过去一周的行动是在美元普遍疲软的情况下采取的。由于美国国债收益率屈服于美联储货币紧缩政策见顶的迹象，衡量美元兑主要贸易伙伴汇率的美元指数11月份已回落超过3%。

Some market participants said state banks might be trying to speed the yuan's gains and spur exporters to convert more of their FX receipts into yuan. The Chinese currency is still down more than 3% against the dollar this year.翻译:一些市场参与者表示，国有银行可能正试图加速人民币升值，并刺激出口商将更多外汇收入兑换成人民币。今年人民币兑美元汇率仍下跌3%以上。

The selling of dollars by state banks caused the onshore spot yuan to briefly touch 7.1296 per dollar, firmer than its daily official guidance for the first time in four months.翻译:国有银行抛售美元导致在岸即期人民币兑美元短暂触及7.1296，四个月来首次高于每日官方指引。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) has also been lowering the dollar-yuan daily fixing rate this week. On Tuesday, it set the midpoint at a 3-1/2-month low of 7.1406 per dollar.翻译:中国人民银行（PBOC）本周也降低了美元兑人民币每日中间价。周二，它将中点定为 3-1/2 个月低点 7.1406 美元兑美元。

"It is surprising to see they keep lowering the fixing at this rate. To me, it looks like they are doing preparatory work ahead of a policy rate cut," said Kiyong Seong, lead Asia macro strategist at Societe Generale.翻译:法国兴业银行首席亚洲宏观策略师 Kiyong Seong 表示：“令人惊讶的是，他们不断以这样的利率下调中间价。在我看来，他们似乎正在为政策利率下调做准备工作。”

"When the external environment is favourable, they appear to strengthen the CNY as much as possible."翻译:“当外部环境有利时，他们似乎会尽可能地强化人民币汇率。”

Recent data shows the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains uneven, with industrial output and retail sales surprising on the upside in October, while manufacturing activity and consumer prices continued to fall.翻译:最新数据显示，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍不平衡，10月份工业产出和零售销售意外上升，而制造业活动和消费者价格继续下降。

While the economy still needs more policy stimulus, analysts say further monetary easing could add downside pressure on the Chinese currency, given the wide differential between interest rates in China and other economies, particularly the United States.翻译:尽管经济仍需要更多政策刺激，但分析师表示，鉴于中国与其他经济体（尤其是美国）的利率差异巨大，进一步的货币宽松可能会增加人民币的下行压力。

The PBOC has been injecting cash through its medium-term lending facility loans into the banking system, but has of late kept the rate on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行一直通过中期借贷便利向银行体系注入现金，但最近保持这些贷款利率不变。

"Some volatilities around this level could be likely at this time, unless there are more further significant downside dollar moves or additional major sentiment positive events," said Zhi Xiaojia, chief China economist at Credit Agricole.翻译:法国农业信贷银行(Credit Agricole)首席中国经济学家支晓佳表示，“除非美元进一步大幅下行或出现其他重大情绪积极事件，否则目前可能会在这一水平附近出现一些波动。”

"Indeed, the yield gap remains quite wide, and we are still expecting more policy easing, including PBOC rate and reserve requirement ratio cut."翻译:“事实上，收益率差距仍然相当大，我们仍然预计会有更多政策放松，包括央行降息和下调存款准备金率。”

Zhi said she was "relatively constructive" on the yuan into the end of the year and 2024.翻译:支表示，她对今年年底和2024年的人民币汇率“相对有建设性”。

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore, Vidya Ranganathan and Nick Macfie翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔、维迪亚·兰加纳坦和尼克·麦克菲编辑

item.title: 中国军舰事件后澳大利亚表示国防人员的安全“重中之重”
item.description:
The safety and wellbeing of Australian defence personnel is Canberra's "utmost priority" and Australia expects all countries to operate militaries in a safe and professional manner, Foreign Minister Penny Wong said on Tuesday.翻译:外交部长黄英贤周二表示，澳大利亚国防人员的安全和福祉是堪培拉的“首要任务”，澳大利亚希望所有国家以安全和专业的方式运作军队。

Wong's comments came a week after an incident involving a Chinese warship and an Australian navy vessel in Japan's Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) in which an Australian military diver was injured.翻译:黄发表此番言论的一周前，一艘中国军舰和一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇在日本专属经济区（EEZ）发生了一起事件，其中一名澳大利亚军事潜水员受伤。

"We have raised our serious concerns with the Chinese authorities following what we regard as unsafe and unprofessional interaction with the PLA Navy destroyer," she said, reiterating Prime Minister Anthony Albanese's comments on Monday.翻译:她表示：“在我们认为与解放军海军驱逐舰发生不安全和不专业的互动之后，我们已向中国当局提出了严重关切。”她重申了安东尼·阿尔巴内塞总理周一的言论。

"These events occurred within Japan's EEZ and international waters and Australia's principled position is that we expect all countries, including ourselves, to operate militaries in a safe and professional manner," Wong said at a joint press conference with her Indian counterpart Subrahmanyam Jaishankar in New Delhi.翻译:“这些事件发生在日本专属经济区和国际水域，澳大利亚的原则立场是，我们希望所有国家，包括我们自己，以安全和专业的方式运作军队，”黄在与印度外长苏杰生在纽交所举行的联合新闻发布会上表示。德里。

HMAS Toowoomba - a long-range frigate - was conducting a diving operation on Nov. 14 to clear fishing nets from its propellers when the Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner, Australia has said.翻译:澳大利亚表示，11 月 14 日，远程护卫舰图文巴号 (HMAS Toowoomba) 正在进行潜水作业，清除螺旋桨上的渔网，此时中国军舰的行为十分危险。

A People's Liberation Army Navy (PLA) destroyer approached HMAS Toowoomba, despite the Australian vessel notifying the Chinese warship of a diving operation, and operated its hull-mounted sonar in a manner that posed a safety risk, Australia has said.翻译:澳大利亚表示，尽管澳大利亚军舰向中国军舰发出了潜水行动通知，但中国人民解放军海军（PLA）驱逐舰还是接近了图文巴号，并以构成安全风险的方式操作其船体声纳。

Beijing has rejected the accusations as reckless and irresponsible and urged Canberra to respect the facts, in an incident which comes amid efforts by the two countries to improve relations.翻译:北京否认这些指控是鲁莽和不负责任的，并敦促堪培拉尊重事实，这一事件发生在两国努力改善关系之际。

The Chinese destroyer Ningbo monitored and identified HMAS Toowoomba, all while keeping a safe distance from it and did not carry out any activities that might affect the diving operations of the Australian side, Beijing has said.翻译:北京方面表示，中国“宁波”号驱逐舰对“图文巴”号进行了监视和识别，并与其保持安全距离，没有进行任何可能影响澳方潜水作业的活动。

Wong and Australia's Deputy Prime Minister and Defence Minister Richard Marles held talks known as the "2+2 Dialogue" with their Indian counterparts on Monday to discuss their cooperation in the Indo-Pacific region and mutual concerns about China, among others.翻译:黄和澳大利亚副总理兼国防部长理查德·马勒斯周一与印度外长举行了“2+2对话”，讨论了两国在印太地区的合作以及对中国的共同关切等。

India's relations with China have deteriorated since a 2020 border clash between their militaries in which 20 Indian soldiers and four Chinese troops were killed.翻译:自2020年两国军队边境冲突导致20名印度士兵和4名中国士兵死亡以来，印度与中国的关系恶化。

Wong said Australia and India both have very substantive economic relationship with China, recognise China’s importance and place in the region, and will continue to engage with it.翻译:黄说，澳大利亚和印度都与中国有着非常实质性的经济关系，认识到中国在本地区的重要性和地位，并将继续与其接触。

Australia, she added, "will cooperate where we can, we will disagree where we must, and we will engage in our national interest".翻译:她补充说，澳大利亚“将在力所能及的地方进行合作，在必须的地方提出不同意见，并且我们将维护我们的国家利益”。

Reporting by YP Rajesh and Krishn Kaushik; Editing by Sharon Singleton翻译:YP Rajesh 和 Krishn Kaushik 报道；莎朗·辛格尔顿编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 调查显示，不到 30% 的日本企业计划在中国扩张
item.description:
The number of Japanese firms planning to expand in China has fallen to less than 30% for the first time, according to a survey published on Tuesday, with economic slowdown, increasing competition and geopolitical tension putting many off.翻译:周二公布的一项调查显示，由于经济放缓、竞争加剧以及地缘政治紧张局势，计划在中国扩张的日本企业数量首次降至不到 30%。

The waning appetite for Japanese businesses to augment operations in Japan's biggest trade partner, alongside the United States, underscores fraught bilateral ties between the east Asian neighbours.翻译:日本企业对扩大在日本最大贸易伙伴以及美国的业务的兴趣减弱，突显了东亚邻国之间的双边关系令人担忧。

In an annual survey by the Japan External Trade Organisation, a semi-governmental export promotion agency, 27.7% of 710 companies said they were expecting to expand operations in China in the next a year or two.翻译:半政府出口促进机构日本贸易振兴机构的年度调查显示，710 家公司中有 27.7% 表示，他们预计在未来一两年内扩大在中国的业务。

The percentage declined from 33.4% last year and 40.9% in 2021.翻译:这一比例较去年的33.4% 和2021 年的 40.9% 有所下降。

Some 31 firms attributed their downsizing to economic uncertainty and a sluggish market, while 15 blamed a slump in Japanese auto sales in China, the world's top car market.翻译:约31家公司将裁员归咎于经济不确定性和市场低迷，而15家公司则将其归咎于日本汽车在全球最大汽车市场中国的销量下滑。

Japanese car makers, like other foreign brands, face the rise of domestic players in China, the popularity of electric vehicles and growing price competition.翻译:与其他外国品牌一样，日本汽车制造商面临着中国本土企业的崛起、电动汽车的普及以及日益激烈的价格竞争。

Seven firms also noted rising geopolitical risks, with bilateral relations, rarely smooth, have been particularly strained over recent months.翻译:七家公司还指出，地缘政治风险不断上升，双边关系很少顺利，近几个月来尤其紧张。

China last month arrested a Japanese executive, an employee of Japanese drugmaker Astellas Pharma (4503.T), on suspicion of espionage. The arrest has had a chilling effect on business, Japanese officials say.翻译:中国上个月以涉嫌间谍罪逮捕了一名日本制药商安斯泰来制药（Astellas Pharma，4503.T）的员工，一名日本高管。日本官员表示，这次逮捕对商业产生了寒蝉效应。

Japan infuriated China when it began releasing treated radioactive water from its wrecked Fukushima nuclear plant into the ocean in August, leading to a Chinese ban on Japanese seafood.翻译:八月，日本开始将失事福岛核电站处理过的放射性水排入海洋， 激怒了中国，导致中国对日本海鲜实施禁令。

Chinese President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida last week said they would pursue mutually beneficial relations in their first face-to-face talks in a year.翻译:中国国家主席习近平和日本首相岸田文雄上周表示，他们将在一年来的首次面对面会谈中寻求互利关系。

item.title: 麦当劳看好中国增长前景，增持本地业务
item.description:
McDonald's (MCD.N) said it had struck a deal to ramp up its stake in its China business to just under 50%, expressing confidence in the burger chain's growth prospects in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:麦当劳(MCD.N)表示，已达成协议，将其在中国业务的股份增至略低于 50%，表达了对该汉堡连锁店在全球第二大经济体的增长前景的信心。

The move contrasts sharply with the prevailing trend of multinational corporations reeling back investments in China or even exiting the market altogether due to geopolitical and economic challenges.翻译:此举与跨国公司因地缘政治和经济挑战而减少在华投资甚至完全退出市场的普遍趋势形成鲜明对比。

The deal to acquire investment firm Carlyle's (CG.O) 28% holding in the burger chain's China business, which also includes its stores in Hong Kong and Macau, will see McDonald's stake rise to 48%. A consortium led by state-backed conglomerate CITIC (0267.HK) has controlling ownership with a 52% stake.翻译:通过收购投资公司凯雷(CG.O)持有的这家汉堡连锁店中国业务（其中还包括其在香港和澳门的门店）28% 的股份，麦当劳的持股比例将增至 48%。由国有企业中信集团（0267.HK）牵头的财团拥有控股权，持有 52% 的股份。

"We believe there is no better time to simplify our structure, given the tremendous opportunity to capture increased demand and further benefit from our fastest growing market's long-term potential," McDonald's CEO Chris Kempczinski said in a statement on Monday.翻译:麦当劳首席执行官克里斯·肯普钦斯基(Chris Kempczinski)周一在一份声明中表示：“我们相信，现在是简化我们结构的最佳时机，因为我们有巨大的机会抓住不断增长的需求，并从我们增长最快的市场的长期潜力中进一步受益。”

Financial terms were not disclosed but two people with knowledge of the transaction said the deal values the China unit at around $6 billion.翻译:财务条款并未披露，但两位知情人士表示，该交易对中国业务的估值约为 60 亿美元。

That is far more than its valuation in 2017 when McDonald's agreed to sell 80% of the business to CITIC, its investment arm CITIC Capital - now known as Trustar Capital - and Carlyle for up to $2.1 billion. At the time, the U.S. firm had wanted to pursue rapid expansion without using much of its own capital.翻译:这远远高于其 2017 年的估值，当时麦当劳同意以高达 21 亿美元的价格将 80% 的业务出售给中信集团、其投资部门中信资本（现称为 Trustar Capital）和凯雷集团。当时，这家美国公司希望在不使用大量自有资本的情况下实现快速扩张。

It is, however, less than the valuation of up to $10 billion that Carlyle and Trustar had at one point been seeking as part of efforts to establish a so-called continuation fund, different sources have previously said.翻译:然而，不同消息来源此前曾表示，这一估值低于凯雷和 Trustar 曾一度寻求的高达 100 亿美元的估值，作为建立所谓持续基金的一部分。

A continuation fund is a type of investment vehicle created by private equity firms that enables them to more easily sell down their stakes in existing investments.翻译:延续基金是私募股权公司创建的一种投资工具，使他们能够更轻松地出售现有投资的股份。

The sources were not authorised to speak to media about the deal and declined to be identified. McDonald's declined to comment on the valuation figure. Carlyle also declined to comment.翻译:消息人士未获授权向媒体谈论该交易，因此拒绝透露姓名。麦当劳拒绝对估值数字发表评论。凯雷也拒绝置评。

Since 2017, the number of McDonald's stores in China has doubled to 5,500 and the country has become its second-largest market. The business aims to have more than 10,000 stores in China by 2028.翻译:自2017年以来，麦当劳在中国的门店数量翻了一番，达到5500家，中国已成为其第二大市场。该公司的目标是到2028年在中国拥有超过10,000家门店。

The business has also generated sales growth of more than 30% since September 2019, the company said in the statement.翻译:该公司在声明中表示，自 2019 年 9 月以来，该业务的销售额增长也超过 30%。

McDonald's made an unsolicited offer for Carlyle's stake in the China operations in recent weeks and the deal was struck quickly, said the sources.翻译:消息人士称，最近几周，麦当劳主动提出收购凯雷在中国业务中的股份，交易很快就达成了。

"Having a stronger investment position should give them a better voice in making sure that the growth that they expect out of that marketplace occurs," said Jim Sanderson, an analyst at Northcoast Research.翻译:Northcoast Research 分析师吉姆·桑德森 (Jim Sanderson) 表示：“拥有更强大的投资地位应该让他们在确保市场实现预期增长方面拥有更好的发言权。”

Reuters reported in August that Trustar Capital was planning to raise a continuation fund that would allow the Chinese private equity firm to sell down its stake in McDonald's China.翻译:路透社8月报道称，信星资本计划筹集一只延续基金，允许这家中国私募股权公司出售其在麦当劳中国的股份。

In contrast to McDonald's, U.S. meat and processed food maker Tyson Foods (TSN.N) plans to sell its China poultry business, sources have said.翻译:消息人士称，与麦当劳不同的是，美国肉类和加工食品制造商泰森食品(TSN.N) 计划出售其中国家禽业务。

British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser (RKT.L) in 2021 sold its China infant formula and child nutrition business to investment firm Primavera Capital for an enterprise value of $2.2 billion.翻译:英国消费品制造商利洁时（RKT.L）于2021年将其中国婴儿配方奶粉和儿童营养品业务以22亿美元的企业价值出售给投资公司春华资本。

item.title: 领跑者称台湾选举是民主还是中国的选择
item.description:
Taiwan's people have to choose in next year's election whether the island keeps moving forward on a road to democracy or "walks into the embrace of China", the frontrunner to be the next president said on Tuesday.翻译:下任总统的领跑者周二表示，台湾人民必须在明年的选举中做出选择，是继续走民主之路，还是“走进中国的怀抱”。

The issue of China, which claims Taiwan as its own territory, looms large ahead of the Jan. 13 presidential and parliamentary elections, especially as Beijing has been stepping up its military pressure on the island.翻译:在1月13日的总统和议会选举之前，中国声称台湾是其领土，这一问题显得尤为突出，特别是在北京方面一直在加大对台湾的军事压力的情况下。

Lai Ching-te, vice president and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party's (DPP) presidential candidate, has led in most opinion polls ahead of the election. The DPP champions Taiwan's separate identity from China.翻译:副总统、执政的民进党总统候选人赖清德在选举前的大多数民意调查中都处于领先地位。民进党主张台湾与中国的独立身份。

The largest opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), which traditionally favours close ties with Beijing, is locked in a dispute with the smaller Taiwan People's Party (TPP) about which of their candidates should run as president and which as vice president after agreeing to work together.翻译:最大的反对党国民党传统上倾向于与北京保持密切关系，现在与规模较小的台湾人民党陷入了争论，双方的候选人在同意后谁应该竞选总统，谁应该竞选副总统。一起工作。

Lai, speaking to reporters and supporters after formally registering his candidacy with the election commission, said Taiwan's security was an international issue and the world was watching the election.翻译:黎智英在向选举委员会正式登记参选后对记者和支持者表示，台湾的安全是一个国际问题，全世界都在关注选举。

"The people of Taiwan have to choose between trusting Taiwan, allowing Taiwan to continue to move forward on the road of democracy, and relying on China, following the old path of the one-China principle, and walking into the embrace of China," he said.翻译:“台湾人民必须做出选择，要么信任台湾，让台湾继续在民主道路上前进，要么依赖中国，走一中原则的老路，走进中国的怀抱。”他说。

Beijing has demanded that Taipei accepts that both sides of the Taiwan Strait belong to "one China", which the DPP-led government has rejected saying only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:北京要求台北接受台湾海峡两岸都属于“一个中国”，但民进党领导的政府拒绝了这一要求，称只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Lai on Monday announced Taiwan's high-profile former de facto ambassador the United States, Hsiao Bi-khim, as his running mate.翻译:赖智周一宣布，备受瞩目的台湾前驻美大使萧美琴为竞选搭档。

Like Lai, Hsiao is vilified by China, which has twice placed sanctions on her, most recently in April, saying she was an "independence diehard".翻译:和黎智英一样，萧也受到中国的诽谤，中国已两次对她实施制裁，最近一次是在四月，称她是“独立顽固分子”。

Late on Monday, Chinese state television lambasted the Lai-Hsiao team in a commentary, saying they were "colluding villains".翻译:周一晚间，中国国家电视台在评论中痛斥丽萧团队，称他们是“恶棍勾结”。

"Taiwan independence means war. The Lai-Hsiao independence double act will intensify cross-strait tensions and conflict," the broadcaster said in the commentary posted on its website.翻译:该电视台在其网站上发表的评论中表示，“台独意味着战争。‘赖萧独’双重行为将加剧两岸紧张和冲突。”

Lai has dismissed China's criticism, saying on Monday it was further proof of its efforts to interfere in the election.翻译:黎智英驳斥了中国的批评，周一表示，这进一步证明了中国试图干预选举。

Lai, standing next to Hsiao outside the election commission, said he was full of confidence.翻译:黎智英站在选举委员会外的萧身边，他表示自己充满信心。

"We both deeply love this land, passionately love this country," he added.翻译:“我们都深深热爱这片土地，热爱这个国家，”他补充道。

The election registration deadline is Friday. It is not clear when the opposition parties will register their candidates.翻译:选举登记截止日期是周五。目前尚不清楚反对党何时登记候选人。

The KMT's presidential candidate, Hou Yu-ih, said he had spoken with the TPP's presidential candidate and party chairman Ko Wen-je on Tuesday and expressed his "sincerity" in wanting to keep talking about how they should team up.翻译:国民党总统候选人侯裕义表示，他已于周二与TPP总统候选人兼党主席柯文哲进行了交谈，并表达了他希望继续讨论他们应如何合作的“诚意”。

"From start to finish I have never insisted I had to be the lead," Hou said, referring to being the presidential rather than vice presidential candidate.翻译:侯说：“从始至终，我从未坚持要求我必须成为领先者。”他指的是总统候选人而不是副总统候选人。

Ko, a former Taipei mayor who founded the TPP in 2019, said on Sunday he would "continue to fight to the end as the TPP's presidential candidate".翻译:2019年创立TPP的前台北市长柯周日表示，他将“作为TPP的总统候选人继续战斗到底”。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Robert Birsel翻译:本·布兰查德报道；林肯·盛宴、罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 专家调查：中国碳排放量将于2030年达到峰值
item.description:
China is on track to meet a goal to bring its climate-warming carbon dioxide emissions to a peak before 2030, according to a poll of 89 experts from industry and academia published on Tuesday, though questions remain over how high the top will be.翻译:周二公布的一项由来自工业界和学术界的 89 名专家参与的民意调查显示，中国有望实现在 2030 年之前使导致气候变暖的二氧化碳排放量达到峰值的目标，但峰值到底有多高仍存在疑问。

More than 70% of respondents said China, the world's biggest carbon dioxide emitter, will be able to meet the target, with two saying its emissions had already peaked, in a poll compiled by the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA), a Helsinki-based think tank.翻译:能源与清洁空气研究中心 (CREA) 编制的一项民意调查显示，超过 70% 的受访者表示，作为全球最大的二氧化碳排放国，中国将能够实现这一目标，其中两人表示其排放量已经达到峰值是一家总部位于赫尔辛基的智库。

Still, "experts remain concerned about how high the peak emissions would reach compared to previous levels," CREA said, with a majority of respondents expecting the total to be at least 15% higher than the 2020 level.翻译:尽管如此，CREA 表示，“专家们仍然担心峰值排放量与之前的水平相比会达到多高”，大多数受访者预计排放总量将比 2020 年的水平至少高出 15%。

Doubts have been cast on China's ability to meet its 2030 pledge, as authorities continue to approve dozens of new coal-fired power stations to meet rising energy demand and avoid a repeat of the disruptive power outages that hit the country in 2021.翻译:人们对中国是否有能力兑现 2030 年的承诺表示怀疑，因为当局继续批准数十个新的燃煤发电站，以满足不断增长的能源需求，并避免重蹈 2021 年发生的破坏性停电的覆辙。

But CREA said respondents, including 64 based in China, were more optimistic about the country's ability to meet its goal compared to last year, with the majority believing post-pandemic economic conditions were accelerating the energy transition.翻译:但 CREA 表示，与去年相比，包括 64 名中国受访者在内的受访者对中国实现目标的能力更加乐观，大多数人认为大流行后的经济状况正在加速能源转型。

Half of the experts surveyed by CREA said they believed China would reach peak primary energy consumption before the end of this decade, though nearly a quarter still forecast it would continue to rise even after 2035.翻译:CREA 调查的一半专家表示，他们相信中国的一次能源消费将在本十年结束前达到峰值，但近四分之一的专家仍预测，即使在 2035 年之后，中国一次能源消费仍将继续增长。

China's reluctance to agree to a phasing-out of fossil fuels is expected to be a major sticking point at COP28 climate talks in Dubai starting next week, though Beijing is willing to agree to a new global plan to triple renewable energy capacity.翻译:尽管北京愿意同意一项将可再生能源产能增加两倍的新全球计划，但中国不愿同意逐步淘汰化石燃料预计将成为下周在迪拜举行的第28届联合国气候变化框架公约(COP28)气候谈判的一个主要症结所在。

China also said in an agreement with the U.S. that it would "accelerate the substitution for coal, oil and gas generation" in order to secure "meaningful absolute power sector emission reductions" this decade.翻译:中国还在与美国的一项协议中表示，将“加速替代煤炭、石油和天然气发电”，以确保本十年“电力行业绝对减排量大幅减少”。

CREA's lead analyst Lauri Myllyvirta said last week it was likely China's emissions would go into a "structural decline" from next year, with renewable sources capable of meeting new energy demand.翻译:CREA首席分析师劳里·米利维尔塔(Lauri Myllyvirta)上周表示，从明年开始，中国的排放量可能会进入“结构性下降” ，可再生能源能够满足新能源需求。

(This story has been corrected to state that emissions likely 'would go into' a decline next year, not 'had already gone into' a decline, in paragraph 9)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，指出明年排放量可能“将进入”下降，而不是“已经进入”下降，第 9 段）

item.title: 中国混合动力汽车销量激增，对外国汽车制造商构成新的威胁
item.description:
As EV makers in China wage an intense price war to prop up slowing demand, Chinese brands with strong hybrid lineups are emerging as winners, attracting consumers with vehicles with long range that can cost less than gasoline cars.翻译:随着中国电动汽车制造商发动激烈的价格战以支撑不断放缓的需求，拥有强大混合动力产品线的中国品牌正在成为赢家，以比汽油车成本更低的长续航里程汽车吸引消费者。

The emerging trend may provide a glimmer of hope for global automakers such as Toyota (7203.T) and Honda who are pursuing "multi-pronged" electrification strategies, as electric vehicle (EV) sales lose momentum in Europe and the U.S., partly because of high auto financing costs.翻译:这一新兴趋势可能为丰田（7203.T）和本田等寻求“多管齐下”电气化战略的全球汽车制造商带来一线希望，因为电动汽车（EV）在欧洲和美国的销售失去动力，部分原因是汽车融资成本高。

One-third of total vehicle sales by Toyota, the world's top-selling automaker, are already hybrids and the company reported a 34% surge in hybrid sales in the six months to end-September, outpacing 9% growth in overall revenue.翻译:全球最畅销的汽车制造商丰田汽车总销量的三分之一已经是混合动力车，该公司报告称，截至 9 月底的六个月内，混合动力车销量猛增了 34%，超过了总收入 9% 的增幅。

Experts warn that foreign brands now face a growing threat from Chinese rivals that have conquered the domestic hybrid market and are looking overseas, emboldened by their strength as the world's lowest-cost EV producer after heavy investment in supply chains.翻译:专家警告说，外国品牌现在面临着来自中国竞争对手的日益增长的威胁，这些竞争对手已经征服了国内混合动力市场，并在对供应链进行了大量投资后，凭借作为全球成本最低的电动汽车生产商的实力，将目光投向海外。

In the United States, most hybrid powertrains sell at a $1,500 to $2,000 premium to combustion models, but in China, some hybrids are offered at a slight discount to gasoline models and can be as much as 23% cheaper than pure EVs.翻译:在美国，大多数混合动力总成的售价比内燃机车型高 1,500 至 2,000 美元，但在中国，一些混合动力车型的售价比汽油车型略有折扣，并且比纯电动汽车便宜 23%。

That price advantage is driving Chinese consumers to hybrid models, which work almost like pure EVs when they are used for short daily commutes, consuming little gasoline, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，这种价格优势正在促使中国消费者购买混合动力车型，这种车型在日常短途通勤时几乎与纯电动汽车一样，消耗的汽油很少。

"People are increasingly accepting that a car can be equipped with both an electric motor and a gasoline engine, as they are highly complementary," said Xu Min, a professor at Shanghai Jiao Tong University's Institute of Intelligent Vehicle. "Wherever the gasoline engine is low in efficiency, we can make up for it with the electric motor."翻译:上海交通大学智能汽车研究所教授徐敏表示：“人们越来越接受汽车可以同时配备电动机和汽油发动机，因为它们具有很强的互补性。” “凡是汽油机效率低的地方，我们都可以用电动机来弥补。”

Two types of hybrids – plug-in hybrid (PHEV) and extended-range hybrid (EREV) - are enjoying strong demand, with their combined shipments surging 85% and outpacing a 14% growth in pure electric car sales this year, industry data showed.翻译:行业数据显示，插电式混合动力汽车 (PHEV) 和增程式混合动力汽车 (EREV) 两种混合动力汽车的需求强劲，今年它们的总出货量猛增 85%，超过纯电动汽车销量 14% 的增幅。

The popularity of these hybrids is so strong that the segment is now half as big as the pure EV market and accounts for 12% of total passenger vehicle sales, according to data from China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM).翻译:根据中国汽车工业协会 (CAAM) 的数据，这些混合动力汽车非常受欢迎，目前该细分市场的规模是纯电动汽车市场的一半，占乘用车总销量的 12%。

Li Auto (2015.HK), the most popular extended-range hybrid seller in China, has thousands of customers waiting for delivery of its new large SUVs, a stark contrast with many other brands grappling with an unsold inventory buildup.翻译:理想汽车（2015.HK）是中国最受欢迎的增程式混合动力汽车销售商，有数千名客户等待其新款大型SUV的交付，这与许多其他品牌陷入未售出库存积压的情况形成鲜明对比。

"The extended-range hybrids are the best option for Chinese drivers who want ... a solution to driving range anxiety, better fuel efficiency, smarter driving features and lower prices," said Yale Zhang, managing director at the consultancy Automotive Foresight.翻译:咨询公司Automotive Foresight的董事总经理张耶鲁表示：“对于想要解决行驶里程焦虑、提高燃油效率、更智能的驾驶功能和更低的价格的中国驾驶员来说，增程式混合动力车是最佳选择。”

In the PHEV market, BYD has cemented its position as the most dominant player, with eight of the 10 top-selling plug-in hybrid cars in China among its offerings.翻译:在插电式混合动力汽车市场，比亚迪巩固了其主导地位，中国最畅销的 10 款插电式混合动力汽车中，比亚迪占据了 8 款。

A PHEV can be driven directly by the electric motor or the gasoline engine. An EREV has a larger battery pack and runs on electricity only, with its gasoline engine serving as a power bank to recharge the batteries when they run low.

CHINA THREAT

The growing popularity of PHEVs and EREVs from Chinese firms, which dominated the top 10 best-selling EREV or PHEV models, have not only affected sales of gasoline cars but also gasoline hybrid vehicles (HEV), a segment Toyota pioneered with the Prius in late 1990s.翻译:中国企业的 PHEV 和 EREV 日益普及，占据了最畅销 EREV 或 PHEV 车型前十名，这不仅影响了汽油车的销售，也影响了汽油混合动力汽车 (HEV) 的销量，后者是丰田最近通过普锐斯 (Prius) 开创的细分市场。 20 世纪 90 年代。

Sales of HEVs in China, which Toyota still dominates with four top-selling models, tumbled 15%, while gasoline car sales dropped 11%, underscoring potential challenges facing foreign automakers.翻译:丰田在中国仍以四款最畅销车型占据主导地位的混合动力汽车销量下降了 15%，而汽油车销量下降了 11%，凸显了外国汽车制造商面临的潜在挑战。

HEVs use gasoline for the main powertrain and come with a relatively small battery pack that is recharged during braking and used for auxiliary power. The sales slump for that type in China is partly a result of from government policy, which favours battery-driven hybrids by offering tax cuts for EVs, PHEVs and EREVs.翻译:混合动力汽车使用汽油作为主要动力系统，并配有相对较小的电池组，该电池组在制动过程中充电并用作辅助动力。中国此类车型销量下滑的部分原因是政府政策，该政策通过为电动汽车、插电式混合动力汽车和增程式电动汽车提供减税政策来支持电池驱动的混合动力汽车。

A foreign automaker was the first to crack the EREV market in China, only to cede it to local rivals: in 2017, General Motors (GM.N) launched the Buick Velite 5 as the first extended-range hybrid in China, two years before Li Auto started volume production.翻译:一家外国汽车制造商率先打入中国增程式电动车市场，结果却将其拱手让给了本土竞争对手：2017 年，通用汽车(GM.N)推出了别克 Velite 5，这是中国首款增程式混合动力车，两年前理想汽车开始量产。

But it was a failed trial, with sales of just over 4,000 units, and GM in 2020 halted sales. By contrast, Li Auto sold 244,225 EREVs in the first nine months of 2023.翻译:但这次尝试失败了，销量仅超过 4000 辆，通用汽车于 2020 年停止了销售。相比之下，理想汽车在 2023 年前 9 个月售出了 244,225 辆增程式电动车。

The struggle of the likes of GM and Toyota is a stark reminder of growing threats posed by Chinese rivals now looking to export markets for growth.翻译:通用汽车和丰田等公司的困境清楚地提醒人们，现在寻求出口市场寻求增长的中国竞争对手所构成的威胁越来越大。

BYD is expanding PHEV sales overseas, offering Han, Qin and Song lineups in Latin America, which has less charging infrastructure.翻译:比亚迪正在扩大插电式混合动力汽车的海外销售，在充电基础设施较少的拉丁美洲提供汉、秦和宋系列产品。

Stellantis (STLAM.MI) is investing $1.6 billion in Leapmotor and is interested in bringing the Chinese partner’s EREV hybrids to Europe, according to people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:据知情人士透露，Stellantis (STLAM.MI)正在向零跑汽车投资 16 亿美元，并有兴趣将中国合作伙伴的 EREV 混合动力车引入欧洲。

Stellantis told Reuters it does not exclude the possibility of cooperation with Leapmotor on new energy technology products. Leapmotor did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:Stellantis向路透社表示，不排除与零跑汽车在新能源技术产品上进行合作的可能性。零跑汽车没有回应置评请求。

Xu at Jiao Tong University, however, noted that the difference in driver demands across markets could affect demand for Chinese cars.翻译:然而，交通大学的徐指出，不同市场驾驶员需求的差异可能会影响对中国汽车的需求。

In North America, for example, consumers would look for cars with bigger horsepower to tow trailers, enabling a bigger popularity for HEVs.翻译:例如，在北美，消费者会寻找马力更大的汽车来牵引拖车，从而使混合动力汽车更加普及。

Still some are sceptical of the HEV's longer-term future.翻译:但仍有一些人对混合动力汽车的长期未来持怀疑态度。

"Conventional hybrid (HEV) is breathing life into a dying patient - the gasoline engine," said Bill Russo, CEO of Shanghai-based advisory firm Automobility.翻译:上海咨询公司 Automobility 首席执行官比尔·拉索 (Bill Russo) 表示：“传统混合动力 (HEV) 正在为垂死的病人——汽油发动机注入生命。”

Reporting by Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Miyoung Kim and Gerry Doyle翻译:张岩、Brenda Goh 报道；编辑：Miyoung Kim 和 Gerry Doyle

item.title: 美国财长耶伦称 TikTok 问题仍未解决
item.description:
The United States has concerns about issues over privacy and social media, and the matter involving TikTok is not yet resolved, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen told CNBC in an interview on Monday.翻译:美国财长耶伦周一在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，美国对隐私和社交媒体问题感到担忧，涉及 TikTok 的问题尚未解决。

Yellen declined to discuss details involving the short video platform owned by Chinese parent company ByteDance, citing pending legal action that prevents U.S. regulators from acting.翻译:耶伦拒绝讨论涉及中国母公司字节跳动旗下短视频平台的细节，理由是悬而未决的法律行动阻止美国监管机构采取行动。

"We do have concerns around the potential issues with privacy and social media," she said, adding that she cannot discuss TikTok specifically. "This is a matter that has not yet been resolved."翻译:“我们确实对隐私和社交媒体的潜在问题感到担忧，”她说，并补充说她无法具体讨论 TikTok。 “这是一个尚未解决的问题。”

"This wasn't an explicit matter of discussion" between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping when they met last week, Yellen told CNBC.翻译:耶伦对 CNBC 表示，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平上周会面时“并没有明确讨论这件事”。

She said she discussed Chinese investments in the United States with her Chinese counterpart during their own meeting, including the process involving the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS).翻译:她说，她在自己的会议上与中国同行讨论了中国在美国的投资，包括涉及美国外国投资委员会（CFIUS）的程序。

CFIUS is an interagency committee, chaired by the Department of Treasury, which reviews foreign investments in U.S. businesses and real estate that implicate national security concerns.翻译:CFIUS 是一个跨机构委员会，由财政部担任主席，负责审查涉及国家安全问题的外国对美国企业和房地产的投资。

Yellen added that both the Washington and Beijing recognize that they have the opportunity to work together after the presidents' met last week.翻译:耶伦补充说，华盛顿和北京都认识到，在上周两国元首会晤后，他们有机会合作。

Reporting by Doina Chiacu and Susan Heavey; Editing by Toby Chopra and Doina Chiacu翻译:Doina Chiacu 和 Susan Heavey 的报道；托比·乔普拉 (Toby Chopra) 和多伊纳·恰库 (Doina Chiacu) 编辑
